title: Ferrari special: Behind Wednesday's bombshell statement
description: F1 has its first political row of the season, with seven of its teams threatening Ferrari and the FIA with legal action. Is the FIA hiding foul play? What comes next?
itunes:title: Ferrari special: Behind Wednesday's bombshell statement
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: F1 has its first political row of the season, with seven of its teams threatening Ferrari and the FIA with legal action. Is the FIA hiding foul play? What comes next?
itunes:summary: F1 has its first political row of the season, with seven of its teams threatening Ferrari and the FIA with legal action. Is the FIA hiding foul play? What comes next?
